website_summaries.verdict: Clean solid lines with a deep espresso color that adds understated elegance to any room it’s in.
pros: This solid wood frame can be used as a daybed or an extra deep sofa
Add some throw pillows for a splash of color and it becomes the perfect place for relaxing with a good book
cons: Assembling this daybed is more difficult than it needs to be
This is definitely a two-person job

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a daybed before deciding on this one. When it arrived I couldn't wait for my husband to get home to help me assemble it because I'm impatient like that. It turns out it was very easy to put together. I really like the look of it, it's very sturdy, and has plenty of room underneath for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks amazing and expensive. It was not easy to assemble on my own but with my husband we had it together in no time. One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. Update: There are several reviews that say it's not sturdy or that they are afraid it will only hold 250 lbs. My husband has slept on it and sat on it several times and he is over 300 lbs. This daybed is sturdy and amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hettie

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived in awful condition. The extent of the damage to this bed was ridiculous. It seemed like every piece had something wrong with it. I have attached pictures of some of the major damage. I did not take pictures of all the damage. I saw the extent of the damage and repackaged the product to return. The quality of this bed was subpar, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter slept in this about a week before one of the slats split in half. She’s never jumped on the bed and doesn’t weigh more than an average nine year old so it’s just really poor quality material. I don’t think I can return an entire bed without it’s original box so we’ll just have to replace this slat with better wood and hope the others don’t do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn E

customer_reviews.title: Bed is too short for a standard 75" long twin ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed is too short for a standard 75" long twin mattress. The description says the bed is 77" long but the openings for the mattresses is only 74" long. The mattress arrived several days EARLY. It took a few hours to put together, no damaged/missing parts. The mattress opening is 74". The 75" twin mattress fits in the top because it can hang over the platform a bit on each end as the ends are open. On the bottom the opening between the legs is 74" which does not allow for the mattress on a trundle platform slide into the opening. I will have to find a slightly shorter mattress or somehow extend the length of the bed?
customer_reviews.author: SuzyGirl

customer_reviews.title: that will do pig
customer_reviews.text: cheap but attractive. would look better with trundle or skirt because front and side lower bars not intended as even visually... looks fine when made. I was actually pretty afraid for the price this would be a make do temporary solution but we like it alot. not bucky board bed slats...meh....fits twin mattress we had. tip: after placing all decor slates on sides and back together when assembling, use rope or belt to cinch down and hold together as you put the rest of the bed together. keeps them from popping out and driving you mad.
customer_reviews.author: Moo Moo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bed
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter really wanted a white day bed. I really like the solid wood design rather than the standard squeaky metal day beds. This bed was easy to put together but def needed two people - one person to hold and one person to screw in the bolts. The locking nuts were a pain and did need a little finessing before they clicked into place. Lower to the ground so under the bed storage is limited to the flat totes or smaller items. We’re using a standard 8” memory foam twin mattress with no box spring. Overall a very cute bed, very sturdy and comfortable to sleep on by my teen.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed to transition our toddler from her crib/toddler bed. This bed does require a good bit of assembly, however, the directions provided are the best I've ever seen. Each piece has either a letter or number on it that matches up with the printed materials perfectly. The directions have picture of everything, even the screws and tools necessary. Very detailed and concise instructions made the assembly a breeze. Good quality and nice finish. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were spot on!!! Upon completion of assembly, the daybed frame looks like it came from a fine furniture store. The bed looks great, solid as a rock, no squeaks or noise of any kind and my standard twin 6 inch mattress on a pop up trundle fits snugly under the frame. Easy to put together alone, would be a tad easier with two persons. Only snag occurred at the start of assembly due to the mis-labeling of 2 similar parts. Once I figured out the mistake all went according to instruction. Should I need to purchase again in the future I will certainly press "buy again"!!! Very satisfied 😌
customer_reviews.author: Dirk  Walker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: This bed came with mismatched parts. Two each of the same sides. Misaligned holes. Had to basically rebuild the bed. We had guest coming so no way to return and replace in time. DO NOT BUY. Also chipped wood, needed to repaint parts of it. I’ve never had such a disappointed product before.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Cracked?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the bed 6 months and it's already cracking. My child doesn't even sleep in it as I can't get him to sleep in his own room so I know it's not normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Groenewoud

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bed and other furnishings in April. The house was getting Painted and remodeled . We just started putting items together and this is what we found. First , Spanish instructions only and we only speak English. All the contents in the box are damaged. Missing hardware to put the bed together and child like writing on the bed. We have never ordered any merchandise that had these problems. Please refund our purchase so we can get our child a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our office/den
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (did it myself while husband was at work, with three kids running around the house). Took me about an hour to get it all put together and moved upstairs where I wanted it. It has a solid feel, and has a nice look to it. Definitely not a cheapy look.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: A good daybed but not for adding a trundle
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived with two damaged pieces. The company promptly sent replacements. The bed took me 3 hours to assemble. It wasn't hard, but took patience. A twin mattress from Sams Club fit the bed nicely. But adding another to a trundle below does not really work well. Twin mattresses are all about 75 inches long. The inside clearance between the bed legs is 74". Once bedding is added it will be even tougher to push the mattress in or pull it out. We are now looking at buying a custom cut foam rubber mattress. The bed doesn't advertise using a trundle but I am surprised the bed wasn't designed just an inch or two longer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transitional bed for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old, because it had 3 sides like a toddler bed, but he could also continue using it as he grew up. It has been perfect for that purpose but it would be great for an adult as well. Putting it together was a bit of a challenge when it came to placing all of the rods on the sides, but other than that was a breeze. Quality is great for the price. It’s obviously not going to be as nice as a solid wood bed but for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a pain, but overall okay frame
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is definitely a two person job. The decorative back slats were a pain to put together. We had trouble with one of the predrilled holes in the corner as well (the screws were not not lining up - had to use an impact driver to get it in). Seems sturdy enough for a guest room with minimal use. Would not recommend for daily use for an adult. All parts arrived undamaged and unscratched. The white frame looks very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Char K

customer_reviews.title: You have to have patience and persistence.
customer_reviews.text: First off, the assembly of this daybed is horrible, a nightmare to put together. It took me two days to finally put the bed together, until completion. The little decor bars for the back and sides have stoppers you place in the holes, which keep them from staying put and keep the bar to fall out of place. I have no idea why they just couldn't have them already included in the headboards? 🤔 Anyway, when the bed is completed, it's actually a sturdy and nice piece of furniture. It's really comfortable to sleep on. If you can get past the frustration of putting this bed together, then I highly recommend it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Relinda

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: 3 different pieces came damaged with pre-drilled holes crooked, cracks and large dents. The footboard didn't slide into the pre cut holes right so leg looks crooked once put together . didnt realize the damage until the bed was 90% put together already so had to decide whether it was worth taking entire thing apart to send back. decided to keep it but i am NOT happy with results. i do not recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on solid wood daybed
customer_reviews.text: This daybed is a great deal. We have a spare bedroom/office and like to keep the dog in there while we are at work. This bed works perfectly. It is very sturdy and solid and the dark wood color looks high-end. We have an extra twin mattress and it stores under the daybed perfectly. The assembly was a pain as every slat has to be held in place during assembly. But overall, we are very happy with the results at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: mary ellen

customer_reviews.title: I spend 5 hours assembling this nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a nightmare and a half to assemble. There's nothing keeping the stupid little peg things on the back and sides in place, besided these little foam things that pushed them out rather than keeping them in. One of the screw things was defective, so I couldn't use it to secure the frame in place. And the wooden dowels were super easy to break. The only positive thing I can say about this frame is that it is cheap, and has not yet collapsed. Buy this and you will dread putting any and all furnature together for the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.author: That one guy who probably exists

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, but missed one piece so I had to make it myself
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give 5 for this bed. All in all, very good and sturdy bed. I got 2 for my kids. BTW, they love them. However, one thing was missing - only one, small round piece of wood on the side. So, before I could continue assembling, I had to make a replacement, then paint it and finish the assembly. I did not want to return the whole bed just for this piece. That's I gave 3 and not 5...
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Reljin

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: Well, the reviews and photos were good. However, the bars on the frame were a pain in the butt to keep in place! I tried doing this myself and eventually needed another pair of hands. I thought of using wood glue, (found this tidbit in the comments after I put the frame together😐) but tredged through with the foam pieces. All in all, nice bed, sturdy and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandma, she was sick of sleeping w/ my grandpa so she asked if I’d buy her a bed and here we are. She absolutely loves it, she sleeps on it every night and is so comfortable. It’s sturdy, very nice and looks sleek. Easyish to set up. We bought the trundle that goes underneath for when company comes so that’ll be fun. Anyway it’s a great frame, especially for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: While I did find the instructions hard to read at first, once i got the hang of them it was easy to follow. Definitely have a friend to help if you can, because those little slats can be a pain to get lined up and put together without an extra set of hands. The bed itself is beautiful and seems to be made of sturdy materials. It will do really nicely in my guest room for years to come, I think
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time and money
customer_reviews.text: First, they sent the wrong bed. Luckily the exchange was simple so that was a plus. However, the bed was not pictured as described. The white is an off-white and the bed is very high off the ground. The assembly was an awful process and was nearly the demise of my marriage. Putting styrofoam circles into the slats is not a safe way to assemble a bed. The bed is squeaky and is not a long-term option.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Poblitz

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but not as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a gorgeous rich color. My only issue is that it seems to be a little flimsy so I would definitely not feel safe with anyone over 250 lbs on it.
customer_reviews.author: A StreetHawk

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 stars because of assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed simple and without a high back. It’s very difficult to put together. Absolutely need two people. All the decorative slats must be put in also. Sides and backIf they were already in, assembling this would have been a breeze. Looks great when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Plan for difficult assembly. Bring extra hands.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very sturdy and nice for a teenager. But the assembly leaves a lot to be desired. The slats just sit in slots and make for assembling the beams very difficult. They kept falling out and making the process start over. Assembly took about 1 1/2 hours more than needed for this alone. A few pieces of the wood had been scratch and the paint missing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley W

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the instructions are frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT follow the directions. The entire back rail system is an absolute joke-- it took me four times assembling it to give up and change my approach. Unless you have rubber bands to keep it together, the "spacers" (which are just tiny pieces of foam and make no sense to include) cause the spindles to fall out. Maybe use glue? It was unnecessarily frustrating. It's a cute bed when finished, but doesn't accommodate a box spring, only a single mattress. The white finish has kind of a "crib" vibe, but it's still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur de Sauvage

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Cherry wood finish is great. Relatively easy to put together, but you will definitely want to have two people working together to put this together as several steps require more than two hands. Pretty sturdy, only a slight creak comes from the back rest area with only certain movements on the bed. Other than this, nice and sturdy without any extra movements with use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at how easily I was able to assemble this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easily I was able to assemble this bed frame (with NO help from my husband)! It took me about 1 hour to assemble and I could not be more happy with the finished product. The wood is of great quality, beautiful coloration and extremely well made. I love that there is enough space between the floor and the bottom of the bed to slide storage bins underneath; the height is 13" from the floor to the bottom of the bed and I was easily able to slide storage bins that are 11" in height underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: For $199 plus change... this was a steal of a deal!! Great instructions... nicely pre-drilled... went together in a snap. Only thing is... they didn’t pre-drill the slat holes on the longest pieces, so a drill was totally necessary. I always use gorilla wood glue to reinforce the connections. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta S. Rowley-sipple

customer_reviews.title: I checked the size prior to purchase w/an Amazon rep. Everything was a go "WRONG!" Only buy if you have time and money to waste!
customer_reviews.text: This daybed requires a special size mattress,the frame is too short for standard American twin bedding.It is constructed of low end material and has many parts requiring a lot of time to assemble, a second set of hands would be helpful. The real frustration with this purchase is total amount of time it cunsumeded including repackaging and shipping the giant puzzle back for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy, looks nice too, matches the other wood in the room. Regular twin mattress fits it fine, as do the linens. A little trouble getting it set up as the stickers on the parts are old & faded, difficult to make out what the letter was on some of them. And the "wood" dings/nicks easily so be careful. Light weight and easy to move for cleaning underneath. Just been up for a couple days but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Morty2

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. It wasn't too difficult to put together. You might just need a step stool or something to hold up one side of the boards while attaching the other end. It took me about two hours to complete on my own. It looks nice and is sturdy. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: It has very bad quality and did not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The daybed arrives with several cracks. It has very bad quality and did not worth the money. In addition, it's difficult to install when compared to IKEA's similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with big scratch
customer_reviews.text: This bed is sturdy and very nice, but it is a PAIN to assemble. It had a big scratch when I took it out of the box and it was too late to return it because of how long it took to put together what we had already. My husband knows how to do everything and always puts things together for me, but this pissed him off! Really not any real instructions.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame, difficult to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: This bed was difficult to get together with two people. The small dowels kept popping out of place while trying to get it attached to the side posts. Aside from the difficulty of putting it together, this is a great frame. I did repaint this black and yellow for a Batman theme for my son’s room and it came out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: zooloo

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It came nicely packaged. Easy assembly! Very sturdy. Looks exactly like the picture. Great for my guest bedroom! And for those who need it it has a payment plan. I couldn’t find one at the furniture stores that looked this nice for this price. Looks more expensive than what I paid. I put a 10inch gel foam twin mattress on it for a perfect fit. I used a board on top of slats since I didn’t buy traditional coil mattress to keep the mattress firm. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Literary Gem

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: The look of this daybed was exactly what I was looking for. There are a lot of pieces to put together, but each are marked and the small parts were also clearly marked. The instructions were clear, but it was difficult for me to get the slats to hold in place until I got the ends screwed in, but the end result was a very sturdy bed. It helps if you have 2 people to put the daybed together. I really am glad I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bed
customer_reviews.text: I put the whole bed together in about two hours, and that's with my 18 month old "helping". Every piece arrived in perfect condition, no scratches or dings. Nothing was missing. Directions were very easy to follow, you can just look at the pictures and figure out what to do. 100% pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: For this price of a day bed, you just can't beat this one, I am impressed with it. I found it to be very well made all solid wood, very sturdy and great looking, the assembly was very straightforward, and I did not find it difficult at all. There is ample room underneath for storage, in fact it sits pretty high off the floor. It works out perfect with a twin foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Schmicter

customer_reviews.title: It showed up in perfect condition and took about 30 minutes to an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: Furniture on Amazon feels risky but it was so worth it! Didn't have to worry about getting this in my car or up my stairs. It showed up in perfect condition and took about 30 minutes to an hour to build (anyone with an ikea background will be pleased) (power drills help). The space underneath is a bit high and it wouldn't work to put a bed skirt on it since the slats go the side of the bed but if you have cute storage containers or want to put another mattress under it'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality. It was hard to put together and the frame is already cracking less than 3 months later with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: K10b

customer_reviews.title: Twin mattress does not fit on this bed correctly
customer_reviews.text: The bed is too small for a standard twin mattress. The width allows for only 38.5". Twin mattresses are typically 39" It was a little tough to assemble, but came together in the end. BUt my mattress doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture. Looks like other daybeds that cost twice as much. Rich dark walnut color. Very sturdy feel. It is helpful to have two people for assembly. If no help is available, I'd suggest add small amount of glue in slats on one back rail before attaching to other side. It's a little difficult to line them all up and keep together while assembling ends. It's a piece of cake to assemble otherwise. I purchased a 6" innerspring mattress from Amazon as well. I've ordered a memory foam topper for the mattress. A thicker mattress will look better on this daybed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kids bed
customer_reviews.text: Pardon the sectional pieces (we we storing them temporarily) I got this daybed with a good twin 7in foam mattress, simple and mid level easy to put together (some parts required 2 people) looks nice and is sturdy with plenty of storage. I got a “used one” with damaged packaging shipped to Alaska for under $90 overall) I am super impressed with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sturdy furniture at a great price. Looks really nice with lots of storage underneath.
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd and assembled by the hubby. He did say that there was one spot that he had to "fix" with the drill because it didn't seem to line up quite right when assembling, hence only 4/5 stars. Otherwise, seems solid and a quality piece. The bed it higher (even w/o boxspring) than standard bed, leaving LOTS of room underneath for storage which is fantastic. Packaged nicely for shipping as well. Would definitely recommend for the price ($199). I had been looking through all of the options out there for a daybed that our daughter was wanting to have. Can't beat this price for the quality. Very sturdy and should last very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Nice day bed.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is nice, and actually pretty sturdy. If they could work on an in the box slat holder for assembly 5 stars. I had to stop assembly and run off to get some painters masking tape to hold them while putting it together. They provide a spacing block for the base slats, why not a small roll of painters tape also? Don't use a stronger adhesive tape when putting it together or you'll spend an equal time getting the tape off as you did putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble looks good for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (did it myself) i cant boast about the most sturdy but my 6'4" husband lays on it with my 3 year old. I have a feeling though this may only last 5 years. But it is great for my toddler and the underneath is great for trundle or storage!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This bed was well packed when received. Easy to put together and is very sturdy and beautiful. I read a lot of reviews before I purchase and decided this was the best value. So glad I Purchased this bad because it looks like it cost more than it did. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. I combed the internet trying to find a wood daybed that had a back rail and was a good price. This is perfect. We just put it together and it was very easy to assemble, quality pieces, very sturdy, good hardware and fairly easy instructions. It's going in our office as an extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Wood Frames are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these daybeds for a guest room, and bought day bed linens, and I love the look. The wood frames are very sturdy, and look and feel much more expensive than I paid. Assembly by my adult son was challenging because there are so many pieces but it just takes patience rather than brains. All the pieces arrived quickly with no damage. The box is very heavy. My guest room is so pretty - I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauter002

customer_reviews.title: Day bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. The first one was a little slow to assemble. The second one went much quicker. This is a good item that can serve multiple uses. I am using one on a screened porch for lounging and napping. The other is going into a child's room for overnite guests.
customer_reviews.author: pbelardi

customer_reviews.title: NO DIRECTIONS PROVIDED
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but no directions.....How the do you put this thing together?!!....Hold on let me look on the internet and find them. ....Also, no customer service on the weekend.....Luckily i have a smart phone and had good signal at the time....Otherwise this piece of crap would've been shipped back. ........So much fun we had......trying to figure it out......4.5 hours later.....none of that time we get back......it's assembled....looks good, sturdy, seems well made....lets see how she holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but just barely
customer_reviews.text: Ugh - very difficult to assemble those slats, especially the back ones. Needed a lot of space and time. And be careful of which side is facing which - can be very confusing. Worst, three of the wood screws spun in their holes - could not apply any torque. Luckily they were on the bottom sides. Even Ikea is better.
customer_reviews.author: jeff in beaverton

customer_reviews.title: Great little bed
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how long these will last because I just bought them last week but they are sturdy and perfect for our kids. I have assembled tons of furniture and this bed was one of the easiest ones ever because parts are labeled and directions are clear. I'm starting my 9th month of pregnancy and I assembled 2 of these by myself but having a helper would make it even easier. It has plenty of room for storage underneath if you don't need to put another bed under it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Ok for most, but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I had to add four extra slats to make this more sturdy and cut the legs to bring it closer to the floor. It’s not the best for a full grown adult as it doesn’t let you stretch out past the foot rail... but other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product-nice finish-good size. Does take a little time to get all the slats mounted to frame rails. Deep seating so 2 rows of back pillows recommended. Blends very well with my mission style home. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Need two people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was very easy to assemble except for the silly aesthetic verticals in the back. I wanted to scream!! I was able to complete this in about an hour. Impressed with the sturdiness. Overall I am happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SportyM16

customer_reviews.title: workmanship was just poor.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting holes were not properly routed out, workmanship was just poor.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 hours to put together, came with all of the parts (including all of the screws) and the only thing I ended up needing was a screwdriver. Wonderful bed frame. One thing to note is that the maximum weight it can hold is 225 pounds. So if you're a college student using a twin bed in a small room, just keep that weight limit in mind. I'm 150lb and it seems to hold me just fine but just wanted to mention the limit anyways. Very easy to put together & the instructions were easy to understand. The actual size was exactly as described on the listing too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I was an octopus...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this daybed for the price. The box was slightly damaged when I received it, but the packaging inside was quite good so there was no damage to all the parts. Assembly instructions were simple and the pieces were clearly labeled. I wish I had read a couple of the reviews more carefully because I struggled with all the slats. I felt like I needed eight arms to hold everything together during assembly as the slats kept falling out in spite of the little foam cushions. All in all, there's nothing fancy or spectacular about the look or quality of the item, and serves its purpose as a bed for company.
customer_reviews.author: G Chen

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well. Instructions were very easy to follow and all hardware was packaged together and was clearly identifiable. Each piece was identified with a removable stick-on label that came off easily. Material is solid pine (no pressboard here) with no imperfections with the stain and clear coat. The only tool, I needed to provide, was a Philips screwdriver, everything else was included in the box. It took me approximately 45 minutes to put this together. On a scale of "Easy", "Medium", or "Hard" for assembly, this project falls in the "Easy" range.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH BOYD

customer_reviews.title: You’ll probably need help putting it together
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a very nice bed it was however very difficult to put together I am grateful my brother helped me and he was able to adjust the screw mechanism with his drill. God bless brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pinto

customer_reviews.title: attractive and not hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble, I would definitely recommend enlisting a friend to help. It's not difficult to assemble but a friend would help keep the side slats in place during the more finicky steps. A very attractive and sturdy finished piece, I am looking forward to having this for a long time. A lot of room for storage under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Scott

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed reviews about this product. This looks nice, not very sturdy as expected for the price. It came with a few broken areas as you can see in the pic. I didn't return as I felt it’s not worth going through the pain to re-pack and return. Building is just okay compared to ikea products. It was really hard to keep the back slats in place while building rhe product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmania

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is better quality than almost all of the beds I have looked at. My 2 year old crawls in and out easily and my 11 year old daughter sleeps in it comfortably as well. It's really nice looking and I think it will hold up...it's made of actual wood! It's a little tricky to put together but I think with some patience just about anybody could handle it. It's easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Bed
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my family room, we use it as a couch/bed and there are been as many as four people sitting on it at one time. Very sturdy, looks nice, tons of storage underneath. My niece lives iwth me and sometimes I'll walk into the family room, and someone will actually sleeping on it. Cats love it. They think I bought it for them.
customer_reviews.author: EKitty

customer_reviews.title: Great daybed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. Very sturdy. A little difficult to put together. You will need two people to put together. There was no damage on the box or product from shipping. Price was good and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Faganjr

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price hard to find in a daybed
customer_reviews.text: It’s great value for price. Recommend a 6-8” mattress would be perfect proportionally. Back and sides are hidden by my 10” mattress. I love it. Dark espresso finish. It goes well in my parlor for guests. Lovely
customer_reviews.author: Betsy M

customer_reviews.title: Big Girl Bed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the grand daughter.. feeling that she was ready for a big girl bed and no longer needing the crib... She loves it and now looks forward to spending time in her room watching TV and playing and of course sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bed!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this bed for our 11 year old daughter. It doesn’t look babyish like a twin bed often can and she has a small bedroom. It fits the bill perfectly. The quality is great and the storage space underneath is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: LadyFitz

customer_reviews.title: It's a good looking bed
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking bed, but there were some problems. One of the back rails split when I was screwing in the bolts, implying that the holes were not lined up properly. Also, when I removed the part stickers, the finish came off. A black magic marker mostly covered the flaws, though. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It took me 45 minutes to assemble. I would suggest using someone to help you when it comes to final assembly because the head and foot board slats like to come out. It comes with two spacer boards to install the slats which was awesome so you don’t have to figure it out. I expect it to last for a while as long as my daughter doesn’t abuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a sturdy, attractive piece that looks just like the picture. I assembled it myself and there was one step that would have been easier with someone else to help, but I used the suggestion of another reviewer and held the back section in place with rubber bands (bungee cord would work too) until I could get everything put together. Take a few minutes to look at the directions before you start. Follow them exactly and you won't have any problems. I estimate it took me three hours from unpacking the pieces to cleaning up the boxes. It looks beautiful in my sitting room and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a daybed.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great step up bed for the older toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of hours to put together but wasn't too difficult. I did have trouble with one side slate that wouldn't fit in the slot due to an imperfect hole. I decided to proceed on and it's barely noticeable (the mattress is thick enough to cover the hole). This was a step up bed for my five year old. It looks nice and is a very stable bed...no movement whatsoever. Very satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonMama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 1/2 year old daughter, as she's transitioning out of her toddler bed. I put it together myself in the space of an afternoon ( stops and starts for other tasks ). The instructions were relatively clear and straightforward, and assembly was pretty easy - EXCEPT for the dang slats! Putting and keeping the back slats in was VERY VERY difficult, and for that part alone I wish I'd had someone helping me. But, I got it done and my daughter loves it. The bed itself is really well made and seems very sturdy and will hopefully last her a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bsnifter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, need two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks nice but you absolutely need two people to put it together, especially when putting in the slats on back and sides. Overall, glad we purchased this bed, just a bit of a project. Instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed frame for my nine year old son and we both love it. The frame look just as the picture. It was easy to put together. He even had a roll out day bed that we was able to easily store underneath. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint and wood defects galore
customer_reviews.text: Obvious defects with pieces of the bed before we even got a chance to put it together. Paint was discovered cracked as we inspected the pieces coming out of the box. These issues will become worse over time. Unfortunately we will have to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I put together a lot of furniture and this is the worst. The only one I ever really had an issue with, ever. Due to gravity, it is literally impossible to get all the slats in the back and sides in. You have to balance them all, and then balance the entire bed to get the other side on because you can’t lay it down or all the slats come out. They actually give you pieces made of styrofoam. NOT A JOKE OR EXAGGERATION! Save your sanity and do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cotroneo

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It was 'fun' to put together....and looks good. Topped it with a 10" foam mattress and it is great. A 6" or 8" mattress might be better if one wants the bed lower. I wanted it to be able to be used as a couch, too, so like it higher.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F. Meade

customer_reviews.title: I got this daybed for my office and love it. My husband assembled it in an 45 ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this daybed for my office and love it. My husband assembled it in an 45 minutes and I helped he just follow the diagram they sent and used the tool that they sent to screw everything together. I had my doubts when we were putting it together about being sturdy; but, when we where done we ended up with a very sturdy bed. Some advice: when you assemble the bottom long boards the ones holding the mattress, put on the one on the back first. We put the front one first and the back one wouldn't fit therefore, we had to take it off then put the back on then re screw the front one again.
customer_reviews.author: Dora A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the bed for my autistic daughter to transition out of her crib that she adored. She now has a new favorite. The bed is perfect and was so easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: You need two people to put it together and it can be frustrating keeping the slats together while you bolt the frame together. It looks fine and seems like it will hold up okay. I wouldn’t put more than 250 pounds or so on it. You get what you pay for but it looks fine and serves its purpose as an occasional guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy, have someone help with assembly
customer_reviews.text: We use it as a couch and it works great. My s/o and I combined go over the weight limit, but we haven't had a problem yet (been a few months). I recommend a helping hand when assembling though, there were a few times I need a second set of hands during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Was a great price when we ordered it $80.00. It goes together in about an hour including time to chase down tools, unpack, assemble and throw out box. I also used wood glue on all the wood dowel joints which make it feel extra sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a wood daybed, but the slats are made of either plastic or MDF. They do not have a permanent connection to the top and bottom of the frame. I had to initiate a return because of missing parts, but was told this item is no longer for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly0807

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Damage
customer_reviews.text: Item came with damage on several pieces of wood in different locations , allen head screws stripped out when putting any torque on them to tighten, wouldn't buy this product again, not worth trying to re-pack and return, wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Unbiased Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It takes longer than 30 minutes and more than one person, despite what they say!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but not the easiest to put together. The little guardrail posts are the devil!!!👹 They do not stay in place trying to assemble into the bottom guardrail. Either they need to find a way to have that already affixed or a better way to assemble it, but I got it done after 2 days, 2 people and wood glue. Other than that, lovely.
customer_reviews.author: N. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. GREAT price for a really nice daybed. Unlike some reviewers I don't think it was too hard to put together. Everything is super labeled (which is one of the few things that is annoying since you will need to clean off the sticker goop that gets left behind). This is sturdy, shockingly good looking and totally does the trick. If I was going to be super critical I'd say that they should provide some little screw covers so you can't see those in front, but overall I think it is a non-issue given the price point.
customer_reviews.author: SandraP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bed great for the price! It is way better than I expected. We purchased an 8inch memory foam mattress from Amazon with this and it fit perfectly! It took my husband and I about an hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Karess

customer_reviews.title: Seriously? Are you kidding me??
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that I ordered 2 espresso colored beds and I received 1 white and 1 espresso. I mean really, what am I going to do with 2 different colored beds??? To make matters worse, it’s a total pain to put together. Even Bob Villa would say what the heck is going on here. It’s ridiculous that I have to box it all up, send it back and wait another 2 weeks for a bed. Now one twin girl has a bed and the other one does not. Thanks Dorel Living
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I put it together myself!
customer_reviews.text: 43 yr old female, I put it together myself!! It’s a very nice sturdy bed. I purchased this to replace a bulky sleigh bed in my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: gmphillygirl

customer_reviews.title: Decent daybed, but requires inspection.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a sturdy bed, however during assembly, one of the supporting bars at the foot of the bed was missing. The manufacturers cut the slot for it at the bottom, but someone got sloppy and didn't cut it at the top. The impact on the frame was purely cosmetic, and overall sturdiness of the product was not affected. I would caution you on inspecting all parts of the bed prior to starting assembly.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Value, quality
customer_reviews.text: Husband was able to assemble this for our toddler in a matter of hours. Love that it's solid wood, and the color is just beautiful. Most importantly is that our son loves it, and was able to adjust nicely from a toddler bed to this size. For the price, the quality, and for the ease of assembly, I would highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Quick Assembly and Sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my vacation home in Florida. We needed to make sure we could fit a trundle underneath. Everything fits perfectly. These were fairly easy to put together. The small wood slats need an additional person to assist you holding top and bottom together but I put two beds together in an hour. Very straight forward instructions and once built seemed sturdy. My 200 lbs husband laid down on one and it wasn't wiggly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Darci

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. It is extremely well made (solid wood) and everything fits together perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and affordable option for twin bed in guest room
customer_reviews.text: An attractive alternative to a futon. Price was very affordable and day bed was delivered promptly and packaged well. My husband was able to assemble himself, however, he said it would be much easier to have assistance Also, when removing stickers from some of the pieces, the finish was easily scratched, so be gentle. All in all, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Day Trips LLC

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Kayden Daybed Solid Wood, Twin, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoThe Dorel Living Kayden Daybed is a versatile piece of furniture that can cover both seating and sleeping needs. Featuring clean lines with a beautiful finish, this wood daybed will blend in with a wide variety of décors. You can use it plain or dress it up with decorative pillows for an added stylish touch. Its solid wood frame makes it sturdy and durable, while the wooden slat details add a classic touch. The slats also provide mattress support and breathability. A box spring or foundation is not required, and the mattress is sold separately. You can use this wooden daybed to provide extra sleeping accommodations for guests. It will work well in a guest room, den or in a small living space because of its compact size. The Dorel Living Kayden Daybed is designed with an underbed clearance that can also accommodate a trundle or allow for extra storage space underneath. Trundle sold separately.
feature_bullets: Traditionally designed Dorel Living daybed. Perfect addition to any living room, guest bedroom or teen's bedroom

Solid wood frame with a rich finish and clean lines. Includes wooden slats to provide mattress support and remove the need for any additional box spring or foundation. Fits a standard twin size mattress. Mattress sold separately
Can accommodate a twin sized trundle (sold separately) to provide extra sleeping space for overnight guests. Clearance can also be used for extra storage
Ships in one box. Quick and easy assembly. 1-year limited warranty
Product dimensions: 77.25”L x 42.25”W x 34”H. Weight limit: 225 lbs. Net weight: 47.3 lbs. Product dimensions: 78”L x 13”W x 6”H. Gross weight: 54.56 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars832 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
